text: Jan Kowalczyk (18 December 1941 – 24 February 2020) was a Polish show jumping competitor. At the 1980 Summer Olympics, he won an individual gold and a team silver medal. He also competed at the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics. Kowalczyk was born in Drogomyśl. He died on 24 February 2020 in Warsaw, at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jan Kowalczyk at Sports-Reference.com Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1968 Summer Olympics Category:1972 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Poland
title: Jan Kowalczyk
